channel.title: [PI]Donator Crown[PI]
channel.description:
Hello, tried adding donator crown. I added the image to cache and tried adding the icon to the client but when i try to talk client crashes? What i do wrong?
[code] if(myPrivilege == 5) { pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, "@cr5@" + myPlayer.name);[/code] Also added the other @ codes.
